house_listing.house_description: View virtual tour @ tours.Bamboo.Com/usa/va/9922237.Htm this former model is in excellent condition! Ready to move in! Builders 10 year warranty conveys. Large tilt out windows. Space for full size washer/dryer. Awesome central location!! Must see to appreciate!!
house_listing.residential_listing_-_additional_feature: Balcony, Breakfast Room, Cable TV, Cathedral/Vaulted Ceilings, CeilingFan(s), Club House, Contemporary Style, Office, Walk-In Closet(s), WetBar
